website_summaries.verdict: There's a lot to like about iBaby, but it feels a little pricey for something with no standalone monitor and poor alerts. It's still one of the best higher-end products of its type, though.
pros: The iBaby Monitor M6S has a great app and lots of bonus features
Plus, its streaming and pan/tilt responsiveness are excellent
cons: The camera has no accompanying monitor, and the motion and audio sensors are too sensitive

customer_reviews.title: Constantly disconnects!!!
customer_reviews.text: I spoke too soon when I initially wrote the review.... the IDEA of this camera is great-- but it simply doesn't work. It constantly kept disconnecting, so the camera would not work. When I called customer service they were helpful to reset it. Then a few hours later it disconnected again. And this has nothing to do with the wifi- our wifi is excellent. We are returning. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DeDominicis

customer_reviews.title: Great for your nursery!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Could be better if the manual stated how to make users in the phone.. you should make one user and then invite people to join (we created a few users and it got stuck). The quality of the picture is good enough and the rotation angle of the camera is very comfortable. It has a very sleek and nice design.. it is white so it kind of disappears in the wall of your nursery. The option to talk and play music to the baby is awesome and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katia SkolTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great product if you only need 1 camera. There is no split screen ability. So you have to manually switch between cameras and you have to manually turn the sound on each time you switch. This makes it impossible to keep track of the cameras while sleeping. There are sound and motion alerts, but it comes as an alarm on your phone. Plus, it keeps going off until you hit ok. This really sucks to do at night. It will keep waking you for every small movement or noise. I sent these back. I had high hopes, but it just doesn’t work for a dual baby monitor system.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: Too late to return. Purchased as baby shower gift with 3 year extended warranty. Need to download app to work with monitor. Drains phone battery such that phones must be plugged in and get very hot while using app. The app will not work on iPad, freezes all the time. Support from company is useless, just say it’s the Wi-Fi connection. Everything else in house works fine. It’s their app. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: dcinpa

customer_reviews.title: What about the air quality monitoring??
customer_reviews.text: Great product, picture quality is amazing and works well with minimal set up out of the box. I gave it four stars because the air quality feature does nothing. There is nowhere in the app to access the data although the advertisement talked about graphs etc. for looking at trends. Also, it's a data mine. Turn off background data use. It ate 6gb in a week and that was almost all in the background.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Joosten

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this monitor. We have the app on both our phones and an old iPad we have. We keep the iPad at home for when the grandma's babysit and we can see it while at work. You do need WiFi for it to work so a couple of times out internet cut out we couldn't see, but that's rare. Has features to play music and white noise too.
customer_reviews.author: alex baez

customer_reviews.title: Looking to buy a second one
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We have had it over a year and I'm looking to buy a second one for the next baby. I like being able to check the baby when I'm not at home too. We have used the monitor in 3 different rooms of our house and never had a problem connecting. Our wifi is 50mbps and we have 4 smart phones, 4 wifi tvs, 2 computers and stream netflix or amazon like all the time running on the wifi in addition to the one camera and the only time i get glitched out is when i run in the middle of the night, but i just close and open the app and it's corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity Issues
customer_reviews.text: We love this monitor except after several hours in use, the connection locks up. We don’t always even notice because there will be a spinning wheel in the middle of the screen which is gray. When in night vision mode, you have to almost be looking for that to notice. We have yet to rely on it while we are sleeping and I’m not sure I will even be able to given I won’t know if it’s working while I’m sleeping. Before anyone says anything, I have fiber optic internet and am using an iPhone manufactured after this device was and the latest operating system.
customer_reviews.author: BLight

customer_reviews.title: User friendly and great quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! We can see our child and all around the nursery no matter where we are! We also bring it with us everywhere! Very easy to set up and the picture quality is great! There are different options for sound, as well as stories and songs. There is also an option to record or take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: jenalee

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is amazing. I think as long as you have good ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing. I think as long as you have good wi-fi strength it'll work great. It does for us. One complaint...the dang cord should be long enough to reach the top of the wall! But all in all, the camera comes in crystal clear, it moves all around the room (we just can't see the same corner it's placed in...but that's expected). Night vision. You can listen in/talk. It plays music. You can give restricted or full access to whoever you want. I'm not really sure there's anything else we'd want in a monitor. I feel like it was a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but well worth it IMO
customer_reviews.text: The Monitor works great for us. We have been using it for 6 months now. Every once in a while the app needs to be restarted but beyond that it works as expected. No issues with WIFI. I do use top of the line equipment so that may help. The app has issues. Songs named wrong, picture freezes sometimes when running in the background. If running on the main screen we have never had an issue. Picture is good. Hopefully they get the app working a little better. We do not use notifications. I would still recommend this to anyone. Mom loves to check on the baby when she is not home which is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good visual, but bad static noise
customer_reviews.text: Overall I recommend it, but know you’ll need to buy a separate audio monitor if you don’t want to sleep through static noise (which might be a deal breaker for some) Pros -visual is great during the day and night -you can move the camera lens through your phone -Easy to move around -you can use LTE to view the cam on the go. -great selection of music to play for the baby -humidity and temp is incredibly handy Cons -BIG CON- sound has a lot of static so I had to purchase a separate audio only monitor (VTec) -humidity and temp doesn’t work if it’s not connected to the base. -you need strong WiFi
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Friend had this, loved it and needed to get one. First one had a watermark spot in it that wouldn't go away but once exchanged it was great
customer_reviews.author: Freya

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone Baby Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome and I especially love that it works with my iPhone phone. The night vision, zoom, pan and tilt are great as well. It also will show the temperature, humidity and airflow all while being able to listen to your kiddo as they sleep. We loved it so much with our first child we bought a second one when our daughter was born Also the iBaby customer service team is top notch. We had a speck on the of one of our monitors and they were quick to respond and send out a replacement. Overall if you have an iPhone and need a baby monitor or even a pet monitor I suggest iBaby.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas G. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and addition to baby monitoring
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on prime day as an extra camera to use around the house. High quality camera. When wifi is strong the quality of the video is awesome. It can lag a bit though, so unfortunately wouldn't depend on this as my go-to. Also, love how it can also be used and alert on movement and sound. You can take pictures or videos, talk to the baby, listen, and even record your own voice to play remotely. I've purchased two more since! Like I mentioned, great addition to the house!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa T

customer_reviews.title: I kept losing wifi intermittently even though the smartphone I ...
customer_reviews.text: I kept losing wifi intermittently even though the smartphone I was using (and running the app) was next to the unit and was also connected to the same wifi with no problems. Around 50% of the time when I tried to access the camera I would only see the 'waiting' circle of doom and the led light on the back of the unit would be red instead of green. I am in New Zealand, not the USA, but I wouldn't have thought there would be an incompatibility issue with wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Kendall

customer_reviews.title: The BEST monitor
customer_reviews.text: After trying and researching a couple other baby monitors we decided to try the iBaby M6S. We had heard good things from a couple friends. This baby monitor does not compare to others. It far exceeded our expectations. The video/picture was so crystal clear. Even the night vision. We've had absolutely no problems with ours. I love that it shows the room temperature and air quality. Every other baby monitor we've tried has been so grainy and doesn't have the options that this one provides.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with good safety items
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device some time ago so we've had some time to test it well and these are the most important points for us: -Good picture quality even using a WiFi outside the US and even at night. -Excellent music library. Our baby loves the songs. -Great room safety features like air quality, temperature, etc which have helped us a lot. -Being able to access it from different devices over the internet. -Being able to use alerts. -Sometimes the WiFi got disconnected but it was because the signal was not strong enough in that area.
customer_reviews.author: Horacio Recalde

customer_reviews.title: Total win!! I wouldn’t want any other monitor.
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this monitor!! The temperature display is a game changer. And the fact that we can access from any device anywhere is fantastic. The picture is so clear, sound quality feels like my baby is in my room and the music feature is just an added bonus. Definitely a win!! Only downside is that the wall mount was not included...we had to pay more for that. But worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok only
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it, but it freezes all the time, even when recording. I hate not having to be able to watch what I missed if I try to catch up on videos. It will freeze and not turn, it will record all the sounds though. It does not always catch the viewers when they are watching. My husband will watch but the viewer log does not show that he watched during that time, or even at all.
customer_reviews.author: Choua Y.

customer_reviews.title: Worked initially, but now...not so much
customer_reviews.text: This machine worked well for about 3 months. It worked okay for the next 2 months. It barely worked for the next 2 months after that. We were excited about a monitor we could both see on our phones, and from anywhere, but it was too good to be true. We’ve reset the machine countless times. We’ve reset our internet countless times. We’ve reinstalled the app over and over and over. Save yourself the time, money and hassle- buy a different monitor that isn’t “internet connected”- too many flaws to recommend this one. Totally unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Harnould

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this it worked great for a few months and then just stopped working. I tried cycling power, checking my internet connection, reset my router, re-installed the app, and a few other things. For some reason it just stopped being able to maintain a connection on my home's wifi network. It was extremely frustrating. I contacted the company, but they weren't very helpful. I eventually gave up and bought one of the indoor Nest Cams; have been using the Nest with no issues at all. Had the iBaby continued to work I would have certainly recommended it to others; however, it wasn't very reliable. Don't bother with this one and get yourself a Nest Cam.
customer_reviews.author: Lem107

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We needed a device to monitor our sick and aging cats and this thing is perfect. Very good image quality, ability to pan the field of view, and night vision all work amazingly. The connection was fast and simple to do, and I can check from my phone whenever I want. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Erik Hofmeister

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 14 months
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product for the 14 months that it worked. By not having a receiver and just streaming over WiFi instead, I could check on baby's nap from across town, or see her sleeping from across the country while I was away on trips. But a week ago it just suddenly stopped working. Rebooting our router, the power, or the iBaby unit itself wont work. For $100 I expect more than 14 months of functionally. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is so perfect and everything a parent needs. It is so easy to install, great features that are user-friendly, has night vision, songs, lullabies, just everything!!! I'm so happy with it. The price is also great value for money. I didn't buy the extra base, I just fixed it to the edge of the crib.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Worhless for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to travel to grandma and grandpa’s, go with a different brand. Every time we went to a new location (i.e. a new Wi-Fi network), I had to delete all cameras and reinstall. However, the app would always “hang” and stall on the Activation page. It simply never got past that page. When I call customer support, their attitude was poor and they wanted to separate network freqs (2.4 and 5.0) as if that was practical on a new network. So my wife and I simply took turns staying with the kids at night until we went to Best Buy and bought another brand - Arlo.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: NOT SMART ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this monitor because of the good reviews, upon installing the app and trying to connect the device to my phone (samsung s9) I immediately ran into a problem and was given an error code. Then I tried connecting to my wifes Iphone 8 and ran into another error. Called the company and was pretty much told that their monitor was not smart enough for my wifi router from xfinity hmmm!!! Returned the product and am in search of a smarter device now lol
customer_reviews.author: arash

customer_reviews.title: Monitor whats important
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.Picture quality is great night vision works just as well. Only gripe i haves the unit is a weird shape. I mounted with the optional mount on a shelf. The app is nice good layout. Love that I can move the camera. For the price compared to just WIFI cameras that are double the price you can't beat the quality and usabilty.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun V.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but loud background noise
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to connect to your phone so you can use the camera. Does pick up background noise from the person on the phone, so the nursery therefore hears all the noise. That is the only real downfall.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Hate this useless piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Where to start. This thing constantly drops from WiFi and doesn’t tell you. Cool!!! So my baby could be crying and I’d have no idea because I’m not in the room with him. It also doesn’t reconnect when it drops, so you have to go unplug it and restart it. Just what you want to do when your kid is sleeping (IF you’re LUCKY enough to know it dropped)! Also, the alerts SUCK and are way too sensitive even on the lowest setting. If he sighs in his sleep or even turns his head I get an alert. I mean, great, be sensitive, but if you’re touting adjustable alerts then I don’t need an alert when he breathes loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Nifty Monitor
customer_reviews.text: First off I'm a techie and yes the baby monitor does have problems but so does my Wi-Fi. When it works, its perfect my wife used it to monitor on Halloween to keep an eye on our baby girl while she was sleeping. Crystal Clear picture, the commands can lag at times but it doesn't bother me. Has 2 way talk my relatives that live in-state and in other states can check-in on her, I thought that was pretty cool. Also, the fact that I can close the app and use my phone as sound monitor, is what makes this device work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The night vision on mine DIED after 2 years and this company will do NOTHING!!!! You spend triple digits for a product, you’d expect better! You’d expect a company to send you a new monitor or even upgrade you free of charge...at the very least offer to fix the broken one. But no. When it works, it’s awesome, so I struggle to give it 2 stars because it’s really a great camera. Unfortunately the connectivity is very unreliable. Doesn’t work well when you are outside the home & on a different WiFi. The customer service is really friendly & prompt in adressing issues.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Great video monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is overall a great device. I'm happy I bought it, video quality is good and the sound is also solid although it holds a lot of white noise. Signal strength is also good. The alerts are mostly false which made me turn them off... In addition the night vision keeps turning of and off when the lights are low which make the monitor make sounds when turning the infra red led on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Tamir Eden

customer_reviews.title: The set up is fairly easy and the app is very user friendly as well
customer_reviews.text: After spending a couple days trying to figure out why I wasn't able to connect my monitor to the wifi, it was apparent that the monitor just does not reach my router on the other side of the wall of my baby's room. I had to buy a wifi extender to put in the baby's room and now the monitor works perfectly. I have no further complaints about the monitor other than the initial wifi connection. The set up is fairly easy and the app is very user friendly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ginion

customer_reviews.title: Lifespan shorter than anticipated for price.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this until just recently. We have had it for over a year now. It is very user friendly and our babysitter has been able to use it as well in her phone with limited control which is great. Unfortunately, it is now out of focus. It’s ok during the day because you can make out the shapes (like if she’s standing up and crying) but otherwise it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: K.Murray

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s great
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few days and already love it. The picture is crisp and clear. I can even see my babies breathing. It is easy to scan and pan the room to see both of my twin girls. I love that I can take pictures while using this. I have already caught some cute and funny things I would’ve missed. Best yet, I left my girls with a babysitter and was able to move it easily to my living room and check in on them whenever I wanted without bothering anyone. I thought I would miss the traditional handheld monitor but I haven’t yet. (Our Motorola just kicked the bucket after 15 months)
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: 1. The picture freezes constantly though the signal strength appears as "Excellent" in the App and I have a high speed WI-FI. 2. The alerts doesn't really work. 3. Picture quality is good as long as no one moves in the frame, when there's a movement the picture either freezes or the quality suddenly drops. 4. The high price doesn't really reflect the quality of the product. 5. I really regret the expense, my expectations from a ~115 $ worth product were much higher.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Erkes

customer_reviews.title: Monitor Baby From Anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Reliable and easy to set up. Apps for your smart phone gives you many options. Outstanding Product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good Video, poor Audio
customer_reviews.text: The video is great, the app works fine, the alerts are a bit hit and miss, but the sound quality is really bad. Listening, all you hear is static, lots of it. Trying to talk thru it, is near impossible. If i didn't nee to have this working 24/7 right now, I'd send it back. It's a good product, that could be much better if you worked out the audio issues.
customer_reviews.author: RomanDA

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I just wish the sound could be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I just wish the sound could be heard better on the monitor. When I say something through it, you can barely hear it on the other end. The clarity is awesome and the night clarity is equally as good.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Pricey piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive piece of junk. This monitor is basically infuriating. When you hear your baby crying, you typically don't want to spend 10 minutes waiting for the stupid thing to load. I have excellent wifi so that is not the issue. It lags horribly and takes forever to load. Would NOT repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Patton

customer_reviews.title: Good cam, but some serious flaws
customer_reviews.text: Great babycam, but challenging to use for travel as it can only be used for one kind of wifi network, and when on a network with the wrong hertz it doesn't let you know, but instead only works intermittently. Incomprehensible there's no network diagnostics tool built in to the software to let you know it's on the wrong type of network. Also, not very good customer support, for us baby people it's not in any way acceptable to wait a couple days for a response.
customer_reviews.author: TROND AAGE SELDAL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works good! I don’t have a wifi issue. Other reviews said you have to have perfect wifi for it to work. My router is directly under it one floor below and it says the signal is excellent. The quality is good. Sound is good. Speaker on it for the music is good. The only thing is I wish it tilted down further. Also there is a firmware issue. If you have apple device with ios 12 or later you cannot set it up. Once it is set up it doesn’t matter the ios. I used an ipad with older ios to set it up. ibaby says they are working it out with apple.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond Cho

customer_reviews.title: After 1 1/2years
customer_reviews.text: We have had problems with this monitor and tried to fix it over and over again. It will work fine for about a month and then the sound will start cutting out in the middle of the night. It just isn’t reliable. There are lots of other errors as well. Sometimes the app won’t refresh and the screen freezes. We are on our second monitor after the first just completely stopped working. The company was difficult to work with to have it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Leha

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awful! Barely ever worked. I talked to customer support multiple times in the first year of owning, and now the company seems to have gone under or something because I cannot get a hold of anyone! Either a busy signal or perpetual voicemail! This thing DOES NOT WORK at all at this point and was a total waste of money. I’m out of warranty and way out of Amazon’s return window. I have no monitor at all now! DO NOT BUY! Wish I could give negative star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Severe picture and sound delay
customer_reviews.text: There is a severe lag on the picture and sound even when using the lowest picture quality setting. Additionally, the panning is very slow and along eith the picture lag makes this a very frustrating product. Not at all worth the price. I returned this item immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Charntelle

customer_reviews.title: Good overall with room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 2 months now for my baby. Overall it serves the purpose, and has a lot of bells and whistles. However, when I use my iphone to monitor him and turn the sound on. There's A LOT of noise that I couldn't use my iphone with sound on. Night vision works well only if you go to the setting, and turn the night vision permanently on instead of auto, otherwise, the monitor switches back and forth and creates a lot of noise when switching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable. I’ve used this camera for 3 months now and am very unhappy with it. It looses connection completely. Sound goes off on its own. I had to buy a back up camera because I could not go to sleep relying on this one. Many times I woke up to find that the camera was off or the sound was off while my baby was crying in the other room. I checked my WiFi and this is not a WiFi issue. If I could return it, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: A great, feature packed baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is our second iBaby monitor, we had a iBaby M6 for our first kid and purchased the M6S when #2 arrived. We have enjoyed both monitors as they come with a lot of good features like pan, tilt, zoom and this model has the air quality and temperature monitoring. They are easy to set up with your iPhone and the app supports multiple monitors so its easy to switch back and forth. I have and would recommend this unit to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: DTR Colorado

customer_reviews.title: App was a little shakey but not too bad. Camera worked well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item. App was a little shakey but not too bad. Camera worked well.... However someone started hacking the camera and screaming at my kids in the middle of the night, so I will be returning this product and advise all others DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor out there!
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend tell me about this monitor and I am really happy with out purchase. I used to live in a 2 floor home and now in a single floor and I have had ZERO issues with the wifi. Its great! Dont let the bad wifi reviews stop you from buying. If you have wifi on ur laptop ur monitor will work great too! It has great picture quality and lots of features! Without this monitor I would have not as easily been able to put my 5 month old in her own room, but because of the alert feature I sleep safe and know it will wake me up when she is up!
customer_reviews.author: Plamena

customer_reviews.title: A Gift
customer_reviews.text: So I can only relay what my brother says about this, and the fact that I've viewed the cam on the app, this product is absolutely badazz., Picture quality is clear, real time, and it will even pick up a mosquito flying about.
customer_reviews.author: Derek F

customer_reviews.title: Andriod not compatible like advertising advises
customer_reviews.text: It says its compatible with andriod it stayed loading never once did I get a picture returned the product back. For iPhone users I hear it's great but the advertising section is not 100 percent truthful. I tried it on multiple androids all the same. It connects sets up gets you excited and just loading for hours. We got picture on one andriod for like 3 minutes and it was pixelated.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor will be great when we get our preemie home! After spending weeks hooked up to monitors, it will be great to see and hear everything for some peace of mind! My husband and I had fun and exploring all the settings and features!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: When I bought this baby monitor it was pretty great. Within the past two years
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this baby monitor it was pretty great. Within the past two years, the temp and humidity readings failed and recently (the reason I'm writing this review) the night vision has failed. After several emails to the company nobody EVER has responded. I do not recommend the purchase of this baby monitor, it's a lemon, and their customer service department is full of lemons.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T.

customer_reviews.title: Great features, but awkward shape makes it less useful than it could’ve  been
customer_reviews.text: The camera is fairly easy to use and setup, and it has great features. However, the awkward shape made it less than ideal to use. The camera can’t rotate to face the other direction, so positioning it for my room layout has been a pain. As much as I love the features, I had to put the camera away and go with a conventionally shaped pan and sweep camera.
customer_reviews.author: AllBus

customer_reviews.title: Decent monitor but frustrating design
customer_reviews.text: Works fine as a baby monitor, but has to be the worst product design I’ve ever seen. It’s round. Yes, it has a base it sits on, but it loosely sits on the base and anytime it’s bumped it goes crashing to the floor and comes apart. I now have 2 toddlers in the house, so it’s nearly impossible to keep them from grabbing at it. There’s no way to mount it to the wall without purchasing additional pieces. It’s also hard to hold onto and rolls around when I’m syncing to the network.
customer_reviews.author: R. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, the app is unusable despite the high quality hardware.
customer_reviews.text: The camera quality is great, but the app is so poorly developed and maintained that it renders the camera unusable. Connection dropped frequently and was very difficult to reconnect, especially if the baby is already asleep. Moving the camera from the app is also very laggy and often unresponsive. Air quality sensor sometimes acts irradically and gives false feedback. And if you have trouble, the customer service line is never available even during normal business hours so I was never able to reach anyone regarding the issues. Ours was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Eustice

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier! It more than exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier! It more than exceeded my expectations. The variety of content for the Lullabies, Stories, White noise and sounds of nature, the ability to record and share and keep on top of things like the room temperature, humidity and air quality (and I'm just getting started) makes this monitor an amazing buy! You can not go wrong😊 Love this device.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for money. Nowhere else will you find a panning tilting baby cam for this value. Wifi and app controlled. Can look at your baby from miles away. Used it once for pet surveillance when we went on vacation. Awesome product. Awesomer customer service.
customer_reviews.author: G. Covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It’s great because it tells you the temperature in the room and you can set it to warn you when the temperature goes above or below a certain number. Color picture images during the day when the lights are on and black and white at night.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Gitchel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They need to improve the application that you access the camera with, needs a lot of work otherwise the camera is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking...
customer_reviews.text: Would not connect to my iPhone. Waste of time. Returning. Customer service was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ras

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product. All features in.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in 2017 and it worked pretty well attending all our needs such as rotation, night vision, the ability to listen and speak to the baby and play nature sounds and other songs. It stopped connecting to my network and the manufacturer was willing to investigate the issue and replace the product. Looking forward to use it again with our next baby coming up!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Lourenço

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you want a dead phone
customer_reviews.text: The iOS app drains batteries within hours, even when running in the background. Unusable. Your phone will die and miss alarms and appointments, especially as a new parent.
customer_reviews.author: Hanster

customer_reviews.title: You will get full support and great customer service !!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product but the best was the support and great customers service that I recurved yesterday. My baby’s monitor have a problem during the startup process, I was in California and I went to iBaby office because they offer me to change it for a brand new and they did it with no questions or challenges, they also gave me additional gifts that i never expect ... the person that help was so great and I feel appreciated as a customer ... thanks iBaby and kudos !!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Mauricio Mata Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Wireless does not work
customer_reviews.text: My product only worked for 2 days. Then, the red light started to show up and couldn't connect the camera again. I had to pay to an IT expert, and he realized through his system that the camera was not getting any WIFI. So my product came with a factory defect and the company does not answer their phone and neither their email for customer support. This is very disappointing since I am outside of the US, I live in Costa Rica, so time passed and now I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cessily Duran

customer_reviews.title: It's good - when it decides to work
customer_reviews.text: The camera works ok. It has great features and specs, but it doesn't work consistently. It needs to be rebooted fairly often. The app is slow and clunky - only works with certain phones and versions of iOS/Android. Not what I'd recommend. I'd rather spend the money and have something work consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great video baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great baby monitor. Bought it during thanksgiving deals. Otherwise a bit pricey for the features
customer_reviews.author: SNechikat

customer_reviews.title: The original iBaby model from years ago was amazing w my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating product but I was desperate. I bought it to watch my cat who lost a leg to cancer . I needed to know if he was getting up on the bed and window . Problem is you Must have a very strong signal. So half the time when I'm not home I can't observe . It also goes from color to BnW , clear pic to blurry n yes I'm on my 3rd one and the prob is the same . The original iBaby model from years ago was amazing w my iPhone . I could be thousands of miles away and see what was going on.. w out " waiting" to connect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: While the idea of this monitor is great, as well as the monitor itself (when functioning properly), it is horribly inconsistent. Even after multiple resets and uninstalls & reinstalls, it is constantly not working correctly. It will black out for periods of time, only to work for about 5 seconds, and black out/freeze again. It worked well for about 2 months with no issues. We are in the same room as our modem and have no issues with WiFi speed, it’s just a faulty product. I have contacted customer service and taken all their direction to rectify with no resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. This baby monitor is useless. The monitor would constantly be disconnected from the WiFi or frozen. When it did work the picture quality was mediocre at best, with a significant delays in sound. Not worth the price. Great concept but the technology/software isn’t quite there yet. Don’t waste your money. Item returned.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing!!! I don't have to worry whatsoever and as a first time mom that's such a relief. I love that it tells you the temp in the room and it has such a clear picture in light and dark. It really is everyhung you could want. Too bad we can only get one right now.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, but wish it were more reliable for the price paid.
customer_reviews.text: Installation wasn't too bad - it was choppy and lagging so bad at first but eventually it worked just fine. However, the temperature and humidity readings never show on the app anymore (it worked for the first few days and then stopped). I've even troubleshooted the issue based on iBaby's FAQ guide, but I've had no luck in getting that feature to work. For the price we paid, I really wish we had gone with something else.
customer_reviews.author: janeeats

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Its okay product not worth the price paid. It doesn’t sense the exact temp. And often gives higher readings. Its very delicate design and have to handle with care. But it solves our purpose and we can move its head from the phone 180 degree to see our baby anywhere in the room.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.P

customer_reviews.title: This thing is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect baby monitor. My husband can get on the app while he is at work and see our baby while she naps. Awesome picture and sound. Plus the app doesn't have to be up to hear her so I can do other things on my phone while using it. If you have a baby or toddler you absolutely need this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor does just about everything! My daughter absolutely Loves it! She can work from home and view, hear and talk to her baby while she's with the Dad or a sitter. Even plays lullabies or your music.
customer_reviews.author: Debora M. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: This gives real time feeds to monitor the house. It allows you to save pictures or video of a live feed, play sounds, or speak to someone being recorded. The optics were clear at night as well. The range of rotation is limiting and slow to adjust although reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: D!

customer_reviews.title: Best camera out there
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Picture is clear, sound function is awesome. Easy to install. Works on my wife's new iPhone and also on my Android. We have multiple linked together in our house and have never had any problems with the app. You will not find a better quality baby cam for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product. Don't need to buy new version. But since night stand is shorter then baby crib i use the box it came in to make it taller.
customer_reviews.author: Raheem Momin

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after short amount of time.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the product when it works. We have gone through 2 that have stopped working. Very disappointing considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product gone bad
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this camera/app pairing and recommend it to everyone, now I warn people to stay away. The developers on the app portion (the way you monitor your baby) do not keep up with system updates and are unresponsive to requests for help. Also unless you have a large bandwidth for your WiFi, you will have a lot of lagging or freezing while monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for the extra info monitor
customer_reviews.text: All the features are great. The only downside is the speed of panning the room. It's understandable, but still something to work on improving. I am thankful for the temperature and humidity sensors. The notice and movement sensors are super sensitive though and we get notifications non-stop! Even when no one is in the room! Super super sensitive!
customer_reviews.author: Serina Juarez

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL! Don’t waste your time/money
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 2 weeks then it started sending us notifications of motions/sounds when the monitor was off. ibaby sent us a new one, but the picture quality turned out so awful, the delays on monitor and phone are just unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Gina W.

customer_reviews.title: The speaker is low quality - not going to sooth baby with staticky speaker
customer_reviews.text: The software is a bit clunky on iPhone. Should be able to see temp and humidity even when zoomed in. Also while in night mode the picture is nowhere near 1080.
customer_reviews.author: Complexlitigator

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camera! I now have two of these and absolutely love them! Rarely have connection issues!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with New IPhones or upgrade IOS
customer_reviews.text: Was working but not anymore with the new iPhones or if you upgrade your iOS to the new one. I’m stuck with two worthless cameras. That’s why a 2 star the company should upgrade or give people their money back.
customer_reviews.author: sunita singh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work times 3
customer_reviews.text: Trying to figure out how to return my third m6s to get a refund. I've been working with their customer service since January but all three cameras they've sent me have had different problems. Too many features I think. Too many things to go wrong. Not to mention the glaring design flaw that it can point down so unless your baby suspends from the ceiling,you won't be able to see them without rigging the camera somehow to look down
customer_reviews.author: brendanmc777

customer_reviews.title: Static noise in a well designed monitor.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor has one flaw that makes all of his qualities disappear- a terrible static noise that is really not something one can ignore. I would expect that the replacement I got would not have the same problem but I was wrong. VERY DISAPPOINTING.
customer_reviews.author: New York Shuk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reception and syncs easily with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent reception and syncs easily with iPhone. My wife and I use it when traveling so we can grab dinner in the hotel lobby and still keep an I on our sleeping toddler. Pricey but its portability is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C Rose

customer_reviews.title: No sound
customer_reviews.text: I am wanting to return my monitor... I can barely hear anything on my phone with the volume up all the way and cant hear a thing on my IPad... I have to have another monitor in the room just so I can hear her if she cries. This is so unfortunate because the clarity of the monitor is sooo good. How can I return this and get my money back?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality just ok..
customer_reviews.text: The only baby camara I found that is wifi 5g compatible. So that was a main plus. But picture quality isn't a good as other cámaras, and it doesn't capture a large area. Have to constantly move it to capture the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Wilniza

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this product except, you could not play anything in the library (music, story books, etc) and watch your baby at the same time. The camera stopped working for me after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sharnae Sanderson-Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: Using this product for our newborn and it has been great. Picture quality is best and we love that we are able to communicate using the device. The app need a lot of improvement though for camera control and music control.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: unable to activate with ios12 as of 10/13
customer_reviews.text: this seems like a great product after only one day of playing with it. i ran into problems activating it with 3 different devices running ios12 as of 10/13/18. once i used an older ipad running ios10, it activated as simply as the box advertises and the app works well on all our devices.
customer_reviews.author: Christian J Cayea

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a baby monitor because I want to hear and see my baby. You have to have the listen function on to hear your baby and the listen function has way to much static to leave it on! The alerts when the monitor detects a sound are all annoying. It disconnects all the time and I have to reenable it, such a waste of money! So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Streker

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this monitor. I'm one of "those" moms and think I have to be right there so I can hear/see her. Since getting this I can put her in the crib in the room and do other things around the house while she's sleeping. Defiantly wish I would have got it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Ortman

customer_reviews.title: App is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! The app is TERRIBLE! Drains your phones battery in the background unless you manually quit out of the app which is extremely inconvenient for checking on your baby throughout the day. Customer service does not care at all. There are so many other companies making monitors. Find another one!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: I really disliked that I had to use my phone as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really disliked that I had to use my phone as the monitor. Also, I got noise and movement notifications when no one was in the bay's room. it just wasn't the monitor for us.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not useful due to bad connection
customer_reviews.text: A black screen with a spinning wheel is the majority of what you will see; the camera has very poor connection to internet, in spite of being very close to the wifi router with great internet speed. We will return
customer_reviews.author: AZ

product_meta.title: iBaby Monitor M6S, Smart Wifi Enabled Total Baby Care System 1080p Wireless Infant Safety Camera Kit with Wi-Fi Speakers, Night Vision, 360° Pan and 110° tilt
product_meta.description:
Style:M6SThis Baby Monitor Will Steal Your Heart 
iBaby Monitor M6s was created to make parents’ lives easier. With 1080p HD video, night vision, 360° view, and smart alerts, you will always know exactly how your baby is doing. Thanks to two-way audio and echo cancelation, you will be able to hear your child and talk to her through your mobile device. You can also play lullabies from the music library, and record your own.
feature_bullets: 1080p HD Video Quality: Full HD baby monitor with crystal clear video resolution, infrared night vision allows you see your baby clearly even in total darkness
Dual Band: This baby monitor works on both 2.4GHz & 5GHz bands, which means it is easier to install, less interfering to your other devices, and better for video streaming viewing, etc

Pan & Tilt Features: Offers the widest view with a 360 degree pan and a 110 degree tilt allowing you to finger touch and adjust your view to easily track your baby. This feature is very desirable especially when you baby starts crawling around

Fast Connect: Our monitor is an Apple company certified product that has Unique licensed MFi connection technology for iOS. This technology allows for easier and faster Installation in comparison to other wifi monitors on the market for iOS devices
Instant Smartphone Baby Monitor Alerts: Alerts will come as push notifications, pictures, or 12 second video clips based on your notification preferences
Sound & Motion Sensors: Allows you to get alerts that keep track of your baby's cry and movements, which enables you to give timely attention, multitasking and have peace of mind
Secure Baby Monitor: Uses the highest AWS security server to ensure your baby is being monitored from a safe and secure device

Mom Assistant Features: This baby monitor includes many features to help mothers including motion and sound detection, customizable feeding and diaper alarms, baby growth and weight tracking, and a privacy breastfeeding button,etc
Instant Smartphone Baby Monitor Alerts: Alerts will come as push notifications, pictures, or 12 second video clips based on your notification preferences
Multiple Users: You can invite multiple users, allowing your family members/friends to watch over your little one too. Set the baby monitor to private with the private button to exclude users

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars794 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
